Source code for test_docstring

[docs]def check_userinputs(mode, image1, result_path):
    """
    This function checks all input parameters before going through the other functions, so that the workflow does not break later

    Parameters
    ----------
    folder path : str

    Returns
    -------

    """

    if mode == 1 or mode == 3:

        # Check if image path filled
        if not isinstance(image1, str) or result_path == "": raise Exception('The path to the image1 is either not a string or is empty')
        if not isinstance(image1, str) or result_path == "": raise Exception('The path to the image2 is either not a string or is empty')

    return mode + 1
